project.name: Codehaus Cargo
project.description: Cargo is a thin wrapper that allows you to manipulate various type of application containers (J2EE, Java EE, Jakarta EE and others) in a standard way.

configuration.bottom: Codehaus Cargo is copyrighted © 2004–2011 Vincent Massol and 2012–2023 Ali Tokmen under the Apache Software License, except for the WebSphere Liberty container which has been released under the MIT License. Click here for more details.
